She is innovative, cooperative, industrious, committed, and optimistic.

This is the project for the master’s degree. It includes the following three steps:
  Extract key variables that affect the energy consumption of office buildings using sensitivity analysis methods.
  Integrate multi-source heterogeneous data of energy consumption including hourly data from metering systems, monthly data from electricity bills, and simulation data.
  Build a hybrid energy consumption prediction model using statistical and machine learning methods
summary: Hybrid energy consumption prediction model for office buildings based on multi-source
title: Hybrid energy consumption prediction model for office buildings

content:
It is teamwork of 6 people, in which Mingyue Guo is the team leader. This project optimizes the form of the environmentally adaptive BIPV modular buildings, including the following steps:
 Simulate the PV power generation, building energy consumption, and the outdoor environmental index (wind speed and UTCI) of the parametrically generated BIPV building. Train data-driving model with machine learning methods (light GBM, SVR, and ANN) using simulation data to quickly obtain building performance indexes. Carry out the multi-objective optimization of building form by using the genetic algorithm.
summary: Carry out the multi-objective optimization of building form by using the genetic algorithm.
title: Optimization of environmentally adaptive BIPV modular building form

summary: Various organizations and societies around the globe have issued guidelines in response to the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) and virus (SARS-CoV-2). In this paper, heating, ventilating, and air-conditioning-related guidelines or documents in several major countries and regions have been reviewed and compared, including those issued by the American Society of Heating Refrigerating and Air-Conditioning Engineers, the Federation of European Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning Associations, the Society of Heating, Air-Conditioning and Sanitary Engineers of Japan, Architectural Society of China, and the Chinese Institute of Refrigeration. Most terms and suggestions in these guidelines are consistent with each other, although there are some conflicting details, reflecting the underlying uncertainty surrounding the transmission mechanism and characteristics of COVID-19 in buildings. All guidelines emphasize the importance of ventilation, but the specific ventilation rate that can eliminate the risk of transmission of airborne particulate matter has not been established. The most important countermeasure, commonly agreed countermeasures, the conflicting content from different guidelines, and further work have been summarized in this paper.
title: Review and comparison of HVAC operation guidelines in different countries during the COVID-19 pandemic

 Simulate VAV system (including VAV boxes, coils, fans, mixing boxes, duct system) of two rooms by MATLAB. Formulate control logic of VAV system using NCE controller offered by Jonson Control. Connect NCE controller (hardware) and VAV system (virtual terminal) by Raspberry Pi.

content:
This research is included in the program of the 13th Five-Year Project of China – Research and development of key technologies for operation optimization of the green building based on BIM.
BIM to BEM part is featured as:
  Check and modify the original BIM and the intermediate file (gbXML) to ensure the success of the BIM to BEM (Building Energy Modelling) transmission.
  Convert BIM to BEM automatically based on gbXML.
  Enrich the BEM converted from BIM by using an external database.
  The biggest obstacle of transmitting BIM to BEM is the deviation of geometrical information. The main reasons for the unsuccessful conversion of BIM to BEM can be classified into two aspects: the error or deviation of information raised by the original BIM, the deviation of information between BIM and gbXML.
The proposed method is more robust and automatic. The BIM checker module checks and modifies the original BIM to reduce the deviation of information, the gbXML editor module simplifies and corrects the gbXML to make sure the success of conversion and quality of BEM, and IDF booster module checks the validity of information and adds essential information to BEM automatically. As tested, the complicated BIM which can’t be converted by GBS or other tools can be transformed to the reliable BEM through the proposed method.
The BIM checker module develops plug-ins of Revit which refine essential geometrical information, add or correct spatial information in BIM, and reconstruct the geometry in a thermal view. The BIM checker module and gbXML module ensure the quality of geometrical information and eliminate the obstacles of converting complex BIM to BEM.
summary: A robust method translate BIM to BEM. The proposed method can check and correct the information automatically, especially the geometrical and spatial information..
title: BIM to BEM

The project is carried by a team of three students in which Mingyue Guo is the team leader. It is an undergraduate students’ innovation and entrepreneurship training program of Chongqing University. This project includes the following steps:
  Design a gas to water heat exchanger and a collector that can collect flue gas of stove without impairing combustion.
  Measure and evaluate the performance of the heat exchanger through experiments.
  Promote the performance of the device.

title: Stove Flue Gas Waste Heat Recovery Device

summary: Obtaining information from BIM (building information modelling) can liberate engineers from the most time-consuming and labour-intensive work of building BEM (building energy modelling). Thus, it becomes a popular topic in both the research and the industrial society in recent years. However, there are no tools that can smoothly accomplish the transformation of a complex BIM to a reliable BEM. The biggest obstacle of BIM to BEM is the deviation of geometrical information, which can be summarized in two main aspects. One is the inaccurate information caused by the original BIM, another is the information deviation among BIM, intermedia files and BEM. A more robust method based on gbXML that can check, simplify and correct some complex geometric information is proposed in this paper.
title: Building energy modelling based on building information modelling: the remaining problems and a more robust method
